text: Albias is a commune in the Tarn-et-Garonne department in the Occitanie region in southern France. The inhabitants are called Albiassains. The town is 10 km north-east of Montauban. As of 1999, about 2,338 people lived in Albias. ==Related pages== *Communes of the Tarn-et-Garonne department Category:Communes in Tarn-et-Garonne
title: Albias
